answers.answer: I am 28 weeks today I'm having a girl too and u feel the same wayi want her to be here for Christmas and everything but 86 more days to go need to hurry:)
I am 28 weeks today I'm having a girl too and i feel the same way I want her to be here for Christmas and everything but 86 more days to go need to hurry:)
I will be 39 weeks tomorrow. And looking back it does feel like ive been pregnant for an eternity.  But keep your head up ladies and enjoy free time  :)
I'm only 11 weeks and I feel like it's been forever. I'm so excited and can't wait for my baby to be here.
I'm 18 weeks and I feel time is passing super quick!
I had my days wrong it's actually 128 more days left :(

You say it's taken FOREVER now just when the day comes you'll be like crap that flew by fast !!I kept saying it's taken forever now the day has come to have him and I my hubby and I and even our kids are like holy crap already ?!? Lol.Enjoy being pregnant cause when the day comes you'll miss it... I haven't had my son yet but I will in 13 hrs and II'm already missing it lol.
I feel exactly the same I say that everyday I wish time would hurry up I don't enjoy being pregnant mostly cus of my diabetes I just want to hold my little monkey already.

question: I'm only 21 weeks and it feels like I have been pregnant forever! I just want my daughter here already but I still have 123 days left!!!!! It's bad enough she won't be here for the holidays I just want everything to speed up and be 9 months already. And I hate that I have to wait every 4 weeks just to see her at doctors appointments. Anyone else going through the same thing?
title: Forever
